Sign the ‘My Library by Right’ petition to support library services everywhere

Written by Alison Wheeler · Published Jan 25, 2016

Sign the petition

The Chartered Institute of Library and Information Professionals (CILIP) is asking library users everywhere to show their support for a campaign which reminds everyone that public libraries are a statutory service.

Many library services have had to reduce opening hours, close library buildings and make library staff redundant.

Here in Suffolk we have managed to avoid all of these, and strengthen what our libraries offer, with our expert staff and our 44 community groups.

If you would like to show your support for what we have and how you feel about public libraries everywhere, please sign the petition.

Alison Wheeler

I've worked in Suffolk's library service since 1979. I've been a children's librarian, stock librarian, worked in the Schools Library Service, run branches and helped introduce our Sunday service. Since 2012 I've been chief executive officer.
